module_definition.name: SimpleSchema
module_definition.description: Example schema describing a simple module.

field.name: content
field.description: A textarea with richtext holding some content.

field.name: keywords
field.description: Some keywords that can reflect the content.

field.name: voting_stats
field.description: Keeps track of the votes a topic has received.

aggregate_definition.name: VotingStats
aggregate_definition.description: Aggregates information on the number of votes, a max(global) score and average voting.

field.name: average_score
field.description: Holds an average voting score ('global score' / 'number of votes').

field.name: global_score
field.description: Holds the sum of all votings that have taken place.

field.name: voting_count
field.description: Holds the number of votes that have taken place.
